properties.entry: SELECT OR_NO FROM MEMBER M JOIN "ORDER" USING(MEM_NO) WHERE MEM_NO = ?

SELECT "ORDER".OR_NO ,IMAGE_URL1 ,P_NAME ,PRICE ,OR_DATE ,P.P_CODE FROM MEMBER M JOIN "ORDER" USING (MEM_NO) JOIN OR_PRODUCT OP ON ("ORDER".OR_NO = OP.OR_NO) JOIN PRODUCT P ON(OP.P_CODE = P.P_CODE) WHERE MEM_NO = ?

SELECT "ORDER".OR_NO ,IMAGE_URL1 ,P_NAME ,PRICE ,OR_DATE ,P.P_CODE FROM MEMBER M JOIN "ORDER" USING (MEM_NO) JOIN OR_PRODUCT OP ON ("ORDER".OR_NO = OP.OR_NO) JOIN PRODUCT P ON(OP.P_CODE = P.P_CODE) WHERE MEM_NO = ? AND OR_YN = 'N'
INSERT INTO CART ( MEM_NO , P_CODE , AMOUNT , OR_CYCLE , CART_DATE , CART_NO ) VALUES ( ? , ? , ? , ? , CURRENT_DATE , SEQ_CARTNO.NEXTVAL )
SELECT POINT_NO , POINT , "DATE" , HISTORY , POINT_UPDATE FROM POINT WHERE MEM_NO = ?
SELECT CART_NO , MEM_NO , P_CODE , P.IMAGE_URL1 , AMOUNT , OR_CYCLE , CART_DATE , P_NAME , PRICE , DELI_FEE FROM CART JOIN PRODUCT P USING (P_CODE) WHERE MEM_NO = ?

SELECT P_NAME ,OR_DATE ,PRICE ,IMAGE_URL1 FROM MEMBER M JOIN "ORDER" USING (MEM_NO) JOIN OR_PRODUCT OP ON ("ORDER".OR_NO = OP.OR_NO) JOIN PRODUCT P ON(OP.P_CODE = P.P_CODE) WHERE MEM_NO = ? AND "ORDER".OR_NO = ? AND P.P_CODE = ?
UPDATE "ORDER" SET OR_YN = 'Y' WHERE OR_NO = ? AND MEM_NO= ? AND EXISTS (SELECT P_CODE FROM OR_PRODUCT WHERE "ORDER".OR_NO = OR_PRODUCT.OR_NO)
